record.title: PROVIDING FOR CONSIDERATION OF H.R. 5818, NEIGHBORHOOD STABILIZATION ACT OF 2008
record.narrative:
PROVIDING FOR CONSIDERATION OF H.R. 5818, NEIGHBORHOOD STABILIZATION ACT OF 2008 -- (House of Representatives - May 07, 2008)

[Page: H3149]
record.chair: The unfinished business is the vote on ordering the previous question on House Resolution 1174, on which the yeas and nays were ordered.
record.narrative: The Clerk read the title of the resolution.

speaking.paragraph: Madam Speaker, point of order. On that, I object.

record.chair: The gentleman will state his point of order.

speaking.paragraph: On resuming with 5-minute voting, I object.

record.chair: That order was entered some time ago. No objection was heard.
The gentleman's objection is not timely.
